name: v1.32.6
body:
Many companies are successfully building with rules_js.
If you're getting value from the project, please let us know!
Just comment on our [Adoption Discussion](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/discussions/1000).

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "1.32.6")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "5.8.2")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node")
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "7ab9776bcca823af361577a1a2ebb9a30d2eb5b94ecc964b8be360f443f714b2",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-1.32.6",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v1.32.6/rules_js-v1.32.6.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# For convenience, npm_translate_lock does this call automatically.
# Uncomment if you don't call npm_translate_lock at all.
#load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
#bazel_features_deps()

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.8.0-rc11 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1298
* chore: update to Bazel 6.3.2 and Aspect CLI 5.7.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1299
* lifecycle_hooks_envs prefixed with npm_config_ should get passed to gyp/lifecycle hook by @sfc-gh-ptabor in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1294
* chore: revert stardoc to 0.5.3 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1304


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v1.32.5...v1.32.6

name: v1.26.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "1.26.0")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "5.8.2")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node")
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "dcd1567d4a93a8634ec0b888b371a60b93c18d980f77dace02eb176531a71fcf",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-1.26.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v1.26.0/rules_js-v1.26.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: move npm repo rules to npm/repositories.bzl by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1018
* test: use unique port for js_run_devserver multirun_test by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1031
* chore(deps): update webpack by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1036
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.1.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1037
* refactor: cleanup js_binary builtin env var setup by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1038
* docs: add docs for the public js_binary env vars by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1023
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.31.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1039
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.3.4 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1040
* feat: align js_binary+library copy_to_bin APIs by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1041
* refactor: update rules_oci e2e by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1046
* Revert "chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.31.0" by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1052
* docs: improve documentation around verify_patches by @Aghassi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1050
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.31.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1047
* fix: when symlinking node_modules symlinks in js_run_devserer, prefer the bazel-out copy instead of the runfiles copy if it exists by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1043
* chore(deps): update webfactory/ssh-agent action to v0.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1003
* docs: note on how to customize the patches directory by @Aghassi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1051
* fix: improve error message for invalid js_library(data) files by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1054
* feat: support custom nodejs toolchains by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1053

## New Contributors
* @Aghassi made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1050

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v1.25.4...v1.26.0

* docs: add missing word by @troycarlson in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/974
* docs: spelling subtitutions -> substitutions by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/980
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.30.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/981
* refactor: split node-patches to main (bazel 6 with unresolved symlinks) and legacy (bazel 5 or no unresolved symlinks) by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/984
* refactor: removed unused is_windows params by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/986
* perf: optimize fs patches when using Bazel 6 with unresolved symlinks by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/985
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.30.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/983
* fix: handle optional deps & prevent long file names in pnpm lockfile v6 used by pnpm 8 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/989
* fix: patchedDependencies works on sub dir and add e2e test by @hunshcn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/976

## New Contributors
* @troycarlson made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/974

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v1.23.2...v1.24.0

name: v1.23.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "1.23.2")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "5.8.2")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node")
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.9.0")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "7c50475662810ce9635fa45d718220285a8adef32b2febd8631aae62e5816353",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-1.23.2",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v1.23.2/rules_js-v1.23.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: keep fs resolve in lifecycle, use rollup instead of ncc by @hunshcn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/954
* chore: update dependencies by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/960

## New Contributors
* @hunshcn made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/954

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v1.23.1...v1.23.2

name: v1.20.1
body:
⚠️ For bzlmod users: this release upgrades rules_nodejs [from 5.8.0 to 5.8.2](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.8.0...5.8.2). That changes the default version of node used. We always recommend registering an explicit nodejs toolchain with a version you pin to, to avoid surprises when our default is upgraded.

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "1.20.1")

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "1aa0ab76d1f9520bb8993e2d84f82da2a9c87da1e6e8d121dbb4c857a292c2cd",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-1.20.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v1.20.1/rules_js-v1.20.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: upgrade skylib to v1.4.1 by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/892
* chore: update bazel-lib to v1.27.0 by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/894
* fix: workaround ambiguous symlinks on osx by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/901
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.27.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/904
* fix: include runfiles tree in js_image_layer when --nobuild_runfile_links is set by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/905
* chore: update to rules_nodejs 5.8.2 by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/906
* ci: build and run unit tests with bzlmod by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/855


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v1.20.0...v1.20.1
